s_synopsis: Prepare Yourself For Competition! You've been selected to represent your country in the most prestigious atheletic event the world has ever known... The Olmypic Summer Games. Compete in 10 track, field and shooting events including the 110 meter hurdles, javelin throw, and archery competition. Experience 10 challenging Olympic events: 100m Sprint, 110m Hurdles, Pole Vault, Triple Jump, Long Jump, High Jump, Javelin, Discus, Skeet Shooting, and Archery Competition. Choose from 2 different play modes: Practice and Competition. Represent one of 32 nations in the games. Challenge actual Olympic records in all events.
